mapper.insert: insert into member (member_num, member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_gender, member_birth_date, member_regist_date , member_addr, member_addr_detail, member_post) values (#{memberNum}, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberGender}, #{memberBirthDate}, sysdate , #{memberAddr}, #{memberAddrDetail}, #{memberPost})
mapper.select: select 1 from zzim where member_num = #{memberNum} and store_num = #{storeNum}
